title: Шоу большой страны
overview: Each episode of the program features witty sketches featuring popular artists. Mikhail Galustyan, Stanislav Duzhnikov, Georgy Dronov, Maria Kravchenko, Maxim Lagashkin, Alexey Maklakov, Svetlana Permyakova, Marina Fedunkiv, Maxim Kiselev, Ivan Pyshnenko and other artists of different genres will tell you what one seventh of the land lives on, and they will do it funny. "The Big Country Show" is about Russia and for Russia.
